headline: Gup – Update binaries installed by “go install”
description:
Hello, golang users!

gup command updates all binaries installed with "go install". Binary updates are easier. https://github.com/nao1215/gup

gup uses goroutine for updates, it is faster than similar tools. I have completed the implementation of the required features. So I would like to hear from you all.
headline_zh-Hans: Gup - 更新由 "go install "安装的二进制文件
headline_zh-Hant: Gup - 更新由 "go install "安裝的二進制文件
description_zh-Hans:
你好，golang用户！

gup命令更新所有用"go install"安装的二进制文件。二进制的更新更容易。 https://github.com/nao1215/gup

gup使用goroutine进行更新，它比同类工具要快。我已经完成了所需功能的实现。所以我想听听大家的意见。
description_zh-Hant:
你好，golang用戶！

gup命令更新所有用"go install"安裝的二進制文件。二進制的更新更容易。 https://github.com/nao1215/gup

gup使用goroutine進行更新，它比同類工具要快。我已經完成了所需功能的實現。所以我想聽聽大家的意見。
